title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 May 20 TU [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Tuesday, 20 May 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On the Tuesday, May 20 broadcast of The Alex Jones Show, Jones breaks down charges that Chinese officials hacked American companies to steal trade secrets, allegations which have led the Chinese to denounce the US's hypocrisy in light of its own recent NSA domestic spy revelations. 

Alex also examines the ongoing militarization of police forces throughout the U.S., as more military vehicles used overseas in places like Iraq and Afghanistan come home to occupy rural and city streets. 

On today's show, Alex invites nutritionist, GCN radio host and registered pharmacist Ben Fuchs [of Youngevity] to discuss the different factors impacting epigenetics, the best methods to influence ideal early human development and the extreme importance of breast milk consumption for infants. 

We'll also look at the amnesty debate, the VA debacle and other NSA news.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
